Class BrowserLinkModel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--BrowserLinkModel
public class BrowserLinkModel
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the bookmarks that are kept and saved as menu items.

Field Summary
private  BrowserModel parentModel
          The model that handles all of the functionality for browsing.
(package private)  java.util.LinkedList sources
          The sources (XUIMenuItems) that will be selected by the user and which need event handling to take the user to a new URL.
